conbody.p: Rainbow () is a GUI program that allows you to execute any existing Okapi utility.Maybe we also need to talk about Tikal for commend-line mode?
Here is an example of extracting XML documents to XLIFFXLIFF is a standard format used by localization tools for translation, using Rainbow.

ol.li: Drop the files to process in the Input List 1 tab.
Associate to each XML document with its relevant parameters file.
Select the Text Extraction command from the Utilities menu. This opens the Text Extraction Utility dialog box.
Go to the Format tab and select XLIFF.
Go to the Package tab. Enter the name of the directory where you want to create the translation package in the Output folder field. The default is C:\Localization Projects.
Enter the name of the package to create in the Package name field. For example: Pack1.
Click Execute to start the process.
